name: Night of The Living Cardboard
description:
Night of The Living Cardboard takes place in a carnival fun house where you blast targets with your plunger launcher.

Controls

Trigger - Fire

Grip - Grab

Reload - Dip hand into barrel 'o' plungers

Team Members

C-Through - Programming

Speaknspell - Level Design

Mexican Leprechaun - Art

MxRider - Art

Assets Used

https://kenney.nl/assets/graveyard-kit

https://www.epidemicsound.com/
